TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecureConversationServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供安全對話服務的認證設定。

span.span: Provides credential settings for a secure conversation service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全對話包含交換多個訊息，而且會使用「安全性內容權杖」(Security Context Token，SCT) 來確保安全性。Secure conversations involve the exchange of multiple messages and use a Security Context Token (SCT) to ensure security. 在通訊工作階段的存留期間，通訊方之間共用此 SCT。The SCT is shared among the communicating parties for the lifetime of a communications session. 服務可以發行兩種不同的 SCT：A service can issue two different kinds of SCTs: - 第一種是包含唯一識別碼的工作階段架構 SCT。訊息只包含此識別碼，而服務會維護在 SCT 識別碼和內容 (例如宣告、安全性金鑰等內容) 之間進行對應的狀態對應快取。The first is a session-based SCT that contains a unique id. Messages carry only the id, and the service maintains a state-mapping cache that maps between the SCT ids and contents (such as claims, security keys, and so on). 正常執行的用戶端必須傳送 SCT 取消，以協助服務最佳化該快取資源。A well-behaved client must send an SCT cancellation to help the service optimize the cache resources. 如果您產生這個類別的方式，是在配合 參數等於 `requireCancellation` 情況下呼叫 `true`，這時就會以這種方式發出此 SCT。If you instantiate this class by calling with the `requireCancellation` parameter equal to `true`, the SCT is issued in this manner. - 第二種是位於用戶端之 Cookie 內的獨立 (Self-Contained) SCT。The second is a self-contained SCT that resides in a cookie on the client. 這種 SCT 包含完整的狀態資訊，因此不需要從服務進行狀態管理，也不需要從用戶端進行 SCT 取消。This SCT contains the entire state information, so requires neither state management from the service nor SCT cancellation from the client. 這種 SCT 有時稱為「Cookie 模式」的 SCT。This is sometimes called a "cookie-mode" SCT. 由於 SCT 包含完整的狀態資訊，因此其大小大於工作階段架構 SCT 的大小。Because the SCT contains the entire state information, its size is larger than in the session-based case. 使用工作階段架構 SCT 時，服務會儲存大部分的狀態資訊。With session-based SCTs, the service stores much of the state information. 然而，因為具有獨立性質，因此它可用於整個服務存留期間，並可在服務關閉到重新啟動整個期間持續。However, because it is self-contained, it can be used across service lifetime and persists across service shutdown and restart.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityContextClaimTypes As Collection(Of Type)

summary.span: 取得用於 Cookie 序列化之 宣告的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the claims for cookie serialization.

value.span: 用於 Cookie 序列化之 宣告的集合。

span.span: A collection of the claims for cookie serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了將宣告序列化到 SCT Cookie 中，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會使用 做為預設值。To serialize claims into SCT cookies, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] uses as the default. 由於「宣告」資源可以延伸，因此，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會允許您提供已知資源類型的清單。Because the Claim resource is extensible, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] allows you to provide a list of known resource types. 這點可在 Cookie 內宣告還原序列化期間協助 ，使其可以傳回原始的強型別物件。This assists the during deserialization of the claims in the cookie so that it can return the original strongly-typed objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何取得這個屬性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UE_SecureConversationServiceCredential#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_secureconversationservicecredential/cs/source.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityStateEncoder ^ SecurityStateEncoder { System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityStateEncoder ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityStateEncoder ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂的 ，此編碼器會用於編碼和解碼 Cookie 序列化。

span.span: Gets or sets a customized for encoding and decoding cookie serialization.
A object, which is a customization of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在「Cookie 模式」中，服務會以用戶端之 Cookie 的形式來向用戶端發出安全性內容權杖 (SCT)，讓用戶端不必維護任何安全性狀態。In "cookie mode", a service issues the client a security context token (SCT) in the form of a cookie to the client so that it does not have to maintain any security state. 用戶端會透過要求訊息來傳回該 Cookie，以便服務知道如何取消保護及確認該要求訊息。The client sends the cookie back in the request message so that the service knows how to unprotect and verify the request message. 由於 SCT 經常是在非安全網路上進行傳輸，因此它必須受到保護。Because the SCT is often transmitted over a non-secure network, it must be protected. 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 會使用 類別，以資料保護 API (DPAPI) 來保護 Cookie。By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] uses the class to protect the cookie using the Data Protection API (DPAPI). 如果要讓 DPAPI 可在 Web 伺服陣列環境中運作，所有的後端服務都必須由相同網域使用者帳戶執行。For DPAPI to work in a Web farm environment, all the backend services must run as the same domain user account. 換句話說，如果服務屬於 Web 主控，則網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 背景工作處理序必須設定成由網域使用者執行。In other words, if the service is Web hosted, then the Internet Information Services (IIS) worker process must be configured to run as a domain user. 這個屬性可讓您使用自訂的 來加密和解密 Cookie，而不要依賴 DPAPI。This property enables you to use a customized to encrypt and decrypt the cookie and not depend on DPAPI. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[S_UE_SecureConversationServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_secureconversationservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)]
